summary: Dig, Dwemer, in the beyond. I'll know your lost unknown and rise to your depths.
descriptionHtml:
Khord, a Dwarf left behind.
You can find him in Morthal in the Moorside Inn.
He is a one-handed level 81 tank.

Head only, he will use whatever body replacer that you have. He can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30062/?]Dwemer Beards
[/url]
Recommended mods to get the same look:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5588/?]The Witcher 2 Models[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20382/?]McMutton Slayer Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13133/?]Dwemer Goggles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6157/?]Tools of Kegrenac From Morrowind
[/url]
author: Revolver Flux
